code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Campaigns=()=>{const[campaigns,setCampaigns]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCampaigns=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/campaigns");setCampaigns(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching campaigns:",error);}};fetchCampaigns();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-dark bg-dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"navbar-brand",href:"/dashboard",children:"AlwaysLearn"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Campaigns"}),campaigns.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:campaigns.map((campaign,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:["Campaign ",index+1]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Audience Size: ",campaign.audienceSize]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sent: ",campaign.sent]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Failed: ",campaign.failed]})]},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No campaigns found."})]})]});};export default Campaigns;
